10 #define RLBOX_ENABLE_IF(...) std::enable_if_t<__VA_ARGS__>* = nullptr

12 template<typename T>
13 constexpr bool true_v = true;
14 
15 template<typename T>
16 constexpr bool is_fundamental_or_enum_v =
17  std::is_fundamental_v<T> || std::is_enum_v<T>;
18 
19 template<typename T>
20 constexpr bool is_basic_type_v =
21  std::is_fundamental_v<T> || std::is_enum_v<T> || std::is_pointer_v<T>;
22 
23 template<typename T>
24 using valid_return_t =
25  std::conditional_t<std::is_function_v<T>, void*, std::decay_t<T>>;
26 
27 template<typename T>
28 using valid_param_t = std::conditional_t<std::is_void_v<T>, void*, T>;
29 
30 template<typename T>
31 using valid_array_el_t =
32  std::conditional_t<std::is_void_v<T> || std::is_function_v<T>, int, T>;
33 
34 template<typename T>
35 constexpr bool is_func_ptr_v = (std::is_pointer_v<T> &&
36  std::is_function_v<std::remove_pointer_t<T>>) ||
37  std::is_member_function_pointer_v<T>;
38 
39 template<typename T>
40 constexpr bool is_func_or_func_ptr = std::is_function_v<T> || is_func_ptr_v<T>;
41 
42 template<typename T>
43 constexpr bool is_one_level_ptr_v =
44  std::is_pointer_v<T> && !std::is_pointer_v<std::remove_pointer_t<T>>;
45 
46 template<typename T_This, typename T_Target>
47 using add_const_if_this_const_t =
48  std::conditional_t<std::is_const_v<std::remove_pointer_t<T_This>>,
49  std::add_const_t<T_Target>,
50  T_Target>;
51 
52 template<typename T>
53 using remove_const_from_pointer = std::conditional_t<
54  std::is_pointer_v<T>,
55  std::add_pointer_t<std::remove_const_t<std::remove_pointer_t<T>>>,
56  T>;
57 
58 template<typename T>
59 using add_const_from_pointer = std::conditional_t<
60  std::is_pointer_v<T>,
61  std::remove_pointer_t<std::add_const_t<std::remove_pointer_t<T>>>,
62  T>;
63 
64 template<typename T>
65 using remove_cv_ref_t = std::remove_cv_t<std::remove_reference_t<T>>;
66 
67 template<typename T>
68 using c_to_std_array_t =
69  std::conditional_t<std::is_array_v<T>,
70  std::array<std::remove_extent_t<T>, std::extent_v<T>>,
71  T>;

73 namespace std_array_to_c_arr_detail {
74  template<typename T>
75  struct W
76  {
77  using type = T;
78  };
79 
80  template<typename T, size_t N>
81  W<T[N]> std_array_to_c_arr_helper(std::array<T, N>);
82 
83  template<typename T>
84  W<T> std_array_to_c_arr_helper(T&&);
85 }
86 
87 template<typename T>
88 using std_array_to_c_arr_t =
89  typename decltype(std_array_to_c_arr_detail::std_array_to_c_arr_helper(
90  std::declval<T>()))::type;
91 
92 template<typename T>
93 using dereference_result_t =
94  std::conditional_t<std::is_pointer_v<T>,
95  std::remove_pointer_t<T>,
96  std::remove_extent_t<std_array_to_c_arr_t<T>> // is_array
97  >;
98 
99 template<typename T>
100 using value_type_t =
101  std::conditional_t<std::is_array_v<T>, c_to_std_array_t<T>, T>;
102 
103 template<typename T>
104 using function_ptr_t =
105  std::conditional_t<std::is_pointer_v<T> &&
106  std::is_function_v<std::remove_pointer_t<T>>,
107  T,
108  int (*)(int)>;

116  : std::true_type

120  std::true_type is_std_array_helper(std::array<T, N>*);
121 
122  template<typename T>
123  std::false_type is_std_array_helper(T*);

125  template<typename T>
126  constexpr bool is_std_array_v =
127  decltype(is_std_array_helper(std::declval<std::add_pointer_t<T>>()))::value;
128 
129  template<typename T>
130  struct is_c_or_std_array_helper<T, std::enable_if_t<is_std_array_v<T>>>
131  : std::true_type
132  {};
133 
134  template<typename T>
135  struct is_c_or_std_array_helper<
136  T,
137  std::enable_if_t<!std::is_array_v<T> && !is_std_array_v<T>>>
138  : std::false_type
139  {};
140 }

172  template<typename T1, typename T2, typename T_Enable = void>
173  struct all_extents_same_helper;
174 
175  template<typename T1, typename T2>
176  struct all_extents_same_helper<
177  T1,
178  T2,
179  std::enable_if_t<std::rank_v<T1> != std::rank_v<T2>>> : std::false_type
180  {};
181 
182  template<typename T1, typename T2>
183  struct all_extents_same_helper<
184  T1,
185  T2,
186  std::enable_if_t<std::rank_v<T1> == std::rank_v<T2> &&
187  !std::is_array_v<T1> && !std::is_array_v<T2>>>
188  : std::true_type
189  {};
190 
191  template<typename T1, typename T2>
192  struct all_extents_same_helper<
193  T1,
194  T2,
195  std::enable_if_t<std::rank_v<T1> == std::rank_v<T2> &&
196  std::is_array_v<T1> && std::is_array_v<T2> &&
197  std::extent_v<T1> != std::extent_v<T2>>> : std::false_type
198  {};
199 
200  template<typename T1, typename T2>
201  struct all_extents_same_helper<
202  T1,
203  T2,
204  std::enable_if_t<std::rank_v<T1> == std::rank_v<T2> &&
205  std::is_array_v<T1> && std::is_array_v<T2> &&
206  std::extent_v<T1> == std::extent_v<T2>>>
207  {
208  static constexpr bool value =
209  all_extents_same_helper<std::remove_extent_t<T1>,
210  std::remove_extent_t<T2>>::value;
211  };
212 }
213 
214 template<typename T1, typename T2>
215 constexpr bool all_extents_same =
216  all_extents_same_detail::all_extents_same_helper<T1, T2>::value;

219 namespace remove_all_pointers_detail {
220  template<typename T>
221  struct remove_all_pointers
222  {
223  typedef T type;
224  };
225 
226  template<typename T>
227  struct remove_all_pointers<T*>
228  {
229  typedef typename remove_all_pointers<T>::type type;
230  };
231 }

233 template<typename T>
234 using remove_all_pointers_t =
235  typename remove_all_pointers_detail::remove_all_pointers<T>::type;

238 namespace base_type_detail {
239  template<typename T>
240  struct base_type
241  {
242  typedef T type;
243  };
244 
245  template<typename T>
246  struct base_type<T*>
247  {
248  typedef typename base_type<T>::type type;
249  };
250 
251  template<typename T>
252  struct base_type<T[]>
253  {
254  typedef typename base_type<T>::type type;
255  };
256

258  struct base_type<T[N]>
259  {
260  typedef typename base_type<T>::type type;
261  };

375  T,

377  T_IntType,
378  T_LongType,
379  T_LongLongType,
380  T_PointerType,
381  std::enable_if_t<std::is_unsigned_v<T> && !std::is_same_v<T, bool> &&
382  !std::is_same_v<T, char> && !std::is_const_v<T> &&
383  !std::is_enum_v<T>>>

397  typename T_LongType,

399  typename T_PointerType>
400  struct convert_base_types_t_helper<
401  T,

404  T_LongType,
405  T_LongLongType,
406  T_PointerType,
407  std::enable_if_t<(
408  std::is_same_v<bool, T> || std::is_same_v<void, T> ||
409  std::is_same_v<char, T> || std::is_same_v<signed char, T> ||
410  std::is_floating_point_v<T> || std::is_enum_v<T>)&&!std::is_const_v<T>>>
